actions.committee: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space and Technology.

official_title: Requiring the Office of Science and Technology Policy to coordinate and evaluate Federal efforts to promote and assist mathematics and science education.

summary.text: Amends the Presidential Science and Technology Advisory Organization Act of 1976 to require the Office of Science and Technology Policy to coordinate and evaluate Federal efforts to promote and assist mathematics and science education.

titles.title: Requiring the Office of Science and Technology Policy to coordinate and evaluate Federal efforts to promote and assist mathematics and science education.
